data.message: Evolve to Veganism and write for the innocent, Animal Liberation!!! Love you EmInEM ! Your brain is the bomb! Use it for the Innocent and most vulnerable amongst us!! Vegan L❤️VE , 💚👊 you are beautiful !

I am a life respector, and I love animals because humans are self emancipated supremacists who are Fkn selfish self importanalized speciesists ,, The only aggressor is the human species who has turned wild animals into slaves. 🖕 You are an ignoramous ! Would you become aggressive if forced into exploitation? Enslavement? Repeatedly being raped by another species who wants to eat you? 🖕
Lol that doesn't answer me

Michael, Gorillas have canine teeth the size of blades,, they are herbivores,, we have 'incisors' lol,, our teeth can't eat raw fresh, we get sick if we eat raw meat, and regarding the ice age, we are natural foragers,, cold climates caused a 'desperation' choice to eat animals,, but NOT our natural biological nature, which is fruits, vegetables, nuts, seeds Etc... The biggest cause of heart disease and cancer in humans is eating animal products,, our cavemen ancestors died in their 30's,, today,, the pharmacudical industries thrive off of us getting sick for 'pill profits' and sell lies about needing to eat animal flesh for the profits intertwined with meat dairy egg industries,,, educate yourself www.nutritionfacts.org ,, it's all about money,,  animals that are forcibly farmed are Herbivorian , innocent beings that are mass produced like products 😪 For profits , the leading cause of all human health problems is caused by eating animals, fact.
Eminem eats meat and you clearly listen to his music... just saying lol. Bitch is so triggered right now

Gorillas have canines for intimidation and fighting/defense purposes. Hence why males have much larger canines than females. And humans lived off animals during ice age. And if they hadn't we would be extinct. Most of my family are the meat and potato type. And  have no health problems from the diet lol. We have canine teeth to rip apart meat. You have your beliefs and that's okay. But calling everyone who disagrees a horrible human being is plain ignorant. And plants are also a living organism. They are in fact alive. So I don't understand your arguement. I respect your choice though, as you should respect everyone else's.
And stop giving yourself likes. Da fuck
I love being called a Bitch, dogs are better than humans 🖕,, and Eminem eating animals is clearly his own ignorance and hopefully he Wakes Up, he is a rebel and is why I respect him and his lyrics.
